channel.title: Dragon claw spec does 4 attacks but only 1 can hit
channel.description: When i use the dragon claw special that i added to my server it does the 4 attacks but only one of them will actually hit the monster. (I have tried over 100 times) Never has it hit twice. Can anyone tell me whats wrong?

item.title: Dragon claw spec does 4 attacks but only 1 can hit
item.dc:creator: @bily123 bily123
item.description:
@bily123 wrote:

crimim:

no

Don’t post useless spam on the forums. (Or anywhere for that matter) this question wasn’t even directed to you obviously.

This is the d claw spec info i have:

public boolean DCDamg = false; public int DCdown = 0;

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtkNPC(true, 50, 282, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; npcDamage(8); }

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAmount -= 50; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit); startAnimation(6000); specOn = false; }
Not sure what part makes it hit 4x instead of 1x

Read full topic
